143586.「<%sM_skill_line>ですね。\n どんなスキルを お望みでしょうか:
<%sM_skill_line>, huh? Which skills
would you like?
<break>

143587.「<%sM_skill_line>の\n どんなスキルを お望みでしょうか？\n:
Which skills would you like for
<%sM_skill_line>?
<break>

143588.「ああっ 申し訳ありません。\n スキル枠に 空きがある状態では\n おぼえるこ:
Ahh, I'm sorry. You can't learn any skills while there are empty skills slots...
Do you want me to set a skill in every skill slot?

143589.「キャンセルすると 今 セットしている\n スキル枠の状態が リセットされ\n:
If you cancel, any changes you've made will
be reset and returned to how it was. Is
that alright?
<yesno 2><break>

143590.「それでは 今 セットされている\n スキルを 新たに おぼえて\n よろしいで:
In that case, would you like to learn the
skills you currently have set?
<yesno><break>

143591.「どのスキル枠に セットしますか？\n セットする スキル枠によって\n 発揮さ:
Which skill slot would you like to set? The
skill's effect may be different depending
on which slot you choose for it.
<break>

143592.「考えなおすのですね。\n じっくり お考えください。\n<bw_break>:
So you're rethinking it, huh? Please, take
your time.
<bw_break>

143593.「わかりました！\n <pc>さん 目をつぶってください。\n それでは いきま:
Understood! <if_woman>Ms.<else>Mr.<endif> <pc>,
please close your eyes. Let's go!
<bw_break>

143594.「わかりました。<%nM_point>の スキル枠に\n <%sM_skill>:
Okay. I'll set <%sM_skill>
for your <%dM_point>P skill slot.
<bw_break>

143595.<se_nots System 7>\n「ふう……。 \n 無事に <pc>さん:
Whew...looks like you able to learn a new skill safely.
If you'd like to learn any new skills, please leave it to me anytime. You can always re-learn skills, too.

143596.「<pc>さん。\n 新しいスキルを おぼえるのでしたら\n いつでも 僕に お:
Ms.Mr. . If you'd like to learn new skills, please leave it to me anytime.
What can I do for you today?

143597.「わかりました。\n では どのスキルから おぼえますか？\n<break>:
Understood. Then, which skill do you want to
learn?
<break>

144270.「僕のところへ 来ていただければ\n いつでも <pc>さんの\n おチカラにな:
I'll do my best to lend you my strength
any time that you come to me.
<end>

144272.「僕が <pc>さんの内に眠る\n スキルの可能性を 解放する\n お手伝いをさ:
I will release the potential of skills that lie within you, .
You can freely choose which skills you would like to learn for 160P and above.
However, you must have a skill set in each slot for 160P and above, or else you can't learn any at all...
There's one important thing to remember. A skill's effect may change depending on which slot you choose to place it in.
If you place it in a high skill point slot, its effect may become stronger.
As you are now, you have the strength to learn any skill, so feel free to try out any skill that you like.
Ah, I forgot to mention that you can't learn a skill more than once, so be sure to remember that.

144275.「他のスキルに 変えられるのですね。\n どのスキルから おぼえますか？\n<b:
You can change your skills. Which skill do
you want to learn?
<break>

150154.「あっ <pc>さんは まだ\n このスキルを セットされたことが\n ないよう:
Ah, it seems like you haven't set this skill
yet. If you're okay with it, I can set the
recommended skills. Is that okay?
<yesno><break>

150155.「わ 失礼しました！ <pc>さんなら\n ご自分で スキルの選択も できますよ:
E...excuse me! Please, choose the skills that
you like best!
<end>

150156.「わかりました！\n それでは 僕に おまかせください！\n えっと このスキル:
Understood! Just leave it to me! So we have
this skill, and that one there...
<bw_break>

150157.「う… お気に召さなかったのですね…\n やはり <pc>さんに お望みのスキル:
Oh... I'm sorry that you didn't like it... After all, it's best for you to choose the skills that you want, isn't it?
You can always re-learn skills, so please try out the various skills.

150182.「<pc>さん 僕から\n この「セット中のスキル」を おすすめしますが\n い:
<if_woman>Ms.<else>Mr.<endif> <pc>, I recommend
this set of skills. How about it?
<yesno 2><break>

150459.<color_yellow>スキル枠に セットしたスキルは\n「スキルふりわけ」:
<color_yellow>Skills set in the skill slots can be used
by allocating points in your "Skill Points"
menu.
<end>

241975.「あっ まだ セットされていないスキルが\n あるようですね。\n<br>\n「:
Ah, you seem to have some skills that haven't been set yet.
If you don't mind, I can fill the empty slots with the skills I recommend. How about it?

241977.「僕に おまかせして いただけるなら\n まとめて一括で スキルをセットすること:
If you let me handle it, I can set all of your skills at once.
I won't change any of the skills that you've already set yourself.
I'll only set the skills that have empty slots. How about it?

241979.<se_nots System 7>\n「<%sM_skill_line>に\n:
<se_nots System 7>
I set the recommended skills for
<%sM_skill_line>!
<bw_break>

243015.「ふう……。 \n 無事に <pc>さんが\n 新たなスキルを おぼえることがで:
Whew...looks like you able to learn a new skill safely.
If you'd like to learn any new skills, please leave it to me anytime. You can always re-learn skills, too.

258988.「ああっ 申し訳ありません。こちらのスキルは \n <%sM_ShareSkil:
Ahh, I apologize. But this skill can't be set
together with <%sM_ShareSkillLine>'s
"<%sM_ShareSkill>".

261150.「どのスキル枠に セットしますか？\n こちらのスキルは どのスキル枠にセットし:
Which skill slot do you want to set? This
skill's effect will stay the same,
regardless of its slot.
<break>

263828.「わかりました。\n では どの職業のスキルを おぼえますか？\n<break>:
Understood. Then, which vocation's skills
do you want to learn?
<break>

263829.「どのスキルから おぼえますか？\n<break>:
Which skill do you want to learn?
<break>

265257.<se_nots System 7>\nタッツィの おすすめスキルを\nセットし:
<se_nots System 7>

282350.「あっ <pc>さん。<%sM_skill_line>に\n その職業では 効果:
